speaker: President. −
english:
President. − Thank you, Mr Chatel. Luc Chatel is the Minister of State for Industry and Consumer Affairs.
We break new ground today by hearing a second representative of the Council, namely Mr Éric Besson, Minister of State to the Prime Minister.
original:
President. − Thank you, Mr Chatel. Luc Chatel is the Minister of State for Industry and Consumer Affairs.
We break new ground today by hearing a second representative of the Council, namely Mr Éric Besson, Minister of State to the Prime Minister.
agenda_item: Electronic communications networks and services - European Electronic Communications Market Authority - Common approach to the use of the spectrum released by the digital switchover - Electronic communications networks and services, protection of privacy and consumer protection (debate)
